trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Moore
There were no other sightings in Moore on or around August 27th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in a parked car in a parking lot next to I-35 in Moore Oklahoma near 12Th street and i noticed a bright kinda of glowing of pulsing ball in the sky zooming by like in less than 5 secs it crossed the whole sky and was gone i was amazed i thought it was a comet but then a few minutes later it came back and stopped right in straight view of the car as if it wanted me to see it and shoot up one time a few hundred feet then came back down it was crazy how fast it was then it just sat there in the sky glowing red and white the next thing i know i could tell it was watching me i had a extreme urge to talk out loud cuz i felt they would be able to hear me i said " I'm not afraid come closer" but nothing i still sensed that they heard me somehow like i was making eye contact with some one in the ship hundreds of yards away it eventually just zoomed away again.then i was taking the trash to the curb and i felt that presence again but i couldnt see anything it was very strange.
